DOC.brief_title: A Dose-ranging , Study Safety Efficacy Subcutaneous Injections LIPO-102 Compared With Placebo Reduction Abdominal Subcutaneous Adiposity
DOC.criteria: 18 50 year old inclusive Localized area abdominal subcutaneous adiposity Grade 3 PPNS CPNS BMI < 25kg/m sq Stable diet exercise body weight Prior treatment abdominal subcutaneous adipose tissue Females within 12 month postpardum Known hypersensitivity drug component
